text: The Men's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 2007 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held on March 4. Germany were originally awarded the gold medal, however, on an appeal by the Russian team, were disqualified for pushing, meaning the gold medal went to Great Britain and NI. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! title: 2007 European Athletics Indoor Championships – Men's 4 × 400 metres relay
